verses.verse: The elders<WG4245> which<WG3588> are among<WG1722> you<WG5213> I exhort<WG3870>, who<WG3588> am also an elder<WG4850>, and<WG2532> a witness<WG3144> of the sufferings<WG3804> of Christ<WG5547>, and also<WG2532> a partaker<WG2844> of the glory<WG1391> that shall<WG3195> be revealed<WG601>:

Feed<WG4165> the flock<WG4168> of God<WG2316> which is among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, taking the oversight<WG1983> there<WG3361>, not by constraint<WG317>, but<WG235> willingly<WG1596>; not<WG3366> for filthy money<WG147>, but<WG235> of a ready mind<WG4290>;
Neither<WG3366> as<WG5613> being lords over<WG2634> God<WG2819>'s heritage, but<WG235> being<WG1096> examples<WG5179> to the flock<WG4168>.
And when<WG2532> the chief Shepherd<WG750> shall appear<WG5319>, you shall receive<WG2865> a crown<WG4735> of glory<WG1391> that fades not away<WG262>.

Likewise<WG3668>, you younger<WG3501>, submit<WG5293> yourselves<WG240> to the elder<WG4245>. Yes<WG1161>, all<WG3956> of you be subject one to another<WG5293>, and be clothed with<WG1463> humility<WG5012>: for<WG3754> God<WG2316> resists<WG498> the proud<WG5244>, and<WG1161> gives<WG1325> grace<WG5485> to the humble<WG5011>.
Humble yourselves<WG5013> therefore<WG3767> under<WG5259> the mighty<WG2900> hand<WG5495> of God<WG2316>, that<WG2443> he may exalt<WG5312> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> due time<WG2540>:
Casting<WG1977> all<WG3956> your<WG5216> care<WG3308> upon<WG1909> him<WG846>; for<WG3754> he<WG846> cares<WG3199> for<WG4012> you<WG5216>.

Be sober<WG3525>, be vigilant<WG1127>; because<WG3754> your<WG5216> adversary<WG476> the devil<WG1228>, as<WG5613> a roaring<WG5612> lion<WG3023>, walks about<WG4043>, seeking<WG2212> whom<WG5101> he may devour<WG2666>:

Whom<WG3739> resist<WG436> steadfast<WG4731> in the faith<WG4102>, knowing that<WG1492> the same<WG846> afflictions<WG3804> are accomplished<WG2005> in your<WG5216> brothers<WG81> that are in<WG1722> the world<WG2889>.

But<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of all<WG3956> grace<WG5485>, who<WG3588> has called<WG2564> us<WG2248> to<WG1519> his<WG846> eternal<WG166> glory<WG1391> by<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, after that you have suffered<WG3958> a while<WG3641>, <WG846> make<WG2675> you<WG5209> perfect<WG2675>, establish<WG4741>, strengthen<WG4599>, settle you<WG2311>.
To him<WG846> be glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> dominion<WG2904> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

By<WG1223> Silvanus<WG4610>, a faithful<WG4103> brother<WG80> to you<WG5213>, as<WG5613> I suppose<WG3049>, I have written<WG1125><WG99999> briefly<WG3641>, exhorting<WG3870>, and<WG2532> testifying<WG1957> that this<WG3778> is<WG1511> the true<WG227> grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> where<WG1519><WG99999> you stand<WG2476>.
The church that is at<WG1722> Babylon<WG897>, elected together with<WG4899> you<WG782>, greets you<WG5209>; and<WG2532> so does Marcus<WG3138> my<WG3450> son<WG5207>.
Greet you<WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> a kiss<WG5370> of love<WG26>. Peace<WG1515> be with you<WG5213> all<WG3956> that<WG3588> are in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>. Amen<WG281>.
